Key Match Events: Paul George hyperextended his left knee during the game
Tyrese Maxey led a comeback after Paul George's injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Sixers' starting lineup had a new look with Eric Gordon replacing Caleb Martin
The game was part of the Sixers' preseason preparation for the 2024-25 season
Others: Joel Embiid was ruled out for the remainder of the preseason due to knee surgery recovery
The injury to Paul George was a significant early-season development
